<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Tormented Slumber](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2295)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Sleep" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=145" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The carved talon of an unidentifiable beast comprises this wand. Blood-stained cloth wraps the thicker part of the talon, which acts as a handle.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast 4th-rank [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), but the slumbering creatures have terrifying nightmares. A creature knocked [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) by this spell takes 1d6 [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). This damage wakes the creature from unconsciousness only if it deals 4 or more damage on a single roll. If the creature awakens from its unconsciousness due to damage (whether it was the persistent mental damage or not), it's [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). If it awakens from damage on its own turn, the creature doesn't reduce its frightened condition automatically on that turn.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of 4th-rank _sleep_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Tormented Slumber
